name: elementary OS UI Kit
description:
Design Library featuring components to help in designing applications for elementary OS.


This library has elementary colour styles, text styles, icons and other commonly used native UI components.


Consider supporting the development of this library through Liberapay. Liberapay is a non-profit, open source and privacy-conscious recurrent donation platform. Payments can also directly be made through PayPal.


If you have any feedback, or want to report bugs or request features, open an issue here at GitHub.
